trans-unit.source: There is no user registered with the this email
trans-unit.target: Uporabnik s tem e-poštnim naslovom ne obstaja

trans-unit.source: Day, month and year are mandatory fields
trans-unit.target: Dan, mesec in leto so obvezna polja

trans-unit.source: The username "%value%" contains characters that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime "%value%" vsebuje znake, ki niso dovoljeni

trans-unit.source: Username must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: Username cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime ne more vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: Invalid email – your email is not in the correct format
trans-unit.target: Neveljavna e-pošta - vaša e-pošta ni v primerni obliki

trans-unit.source: "%value%" is too short. The username should be at least 3 characters.
trans-unit.target: "%value%" je prekratek. Uporabniško ime mora vsebovati vsaj 3 znake.

trans-unit.source: Your password should be at least %min_length% characters long
trans-unit.target: Vaše geslo mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: Your password cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Vaše geslo ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znako

trans-unit.source: We will send the new password, to the email address you provided during registration
trans-unit.target: Novo geslo vam bomo poslali na e-pošto, ki ste jo navedli ob registraciji

trans-unit.source: This email address has already been registered by another user
trans-unit.target: Uporabnik s tem e-poštnim naslovom že obstaja

trans-unit.source: This username is already in use
trans-unit.target: To uporabniško ime je že v uporabi

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Please start typing the name of your home location and select from the list.
trans-unit.target: To polje je obvezno. Prosimo, začnite pisati ime svoje domače lokacije in izberite s seznama.

trans-unit.source: You have entered the text incorrectly. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Besedila niste pravilno napisali. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.

trans-unit.source: You must select a file to upload
trans-unit.target: Izbrati morate datoteko, ki jo želite naložiti

trans-unit.source: The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Datoteka, ki ste jo poslali ni v veljavni obliki. Prosimo, naložite JPG, GIF ali PNG datoteko.

trans-unit.source: The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Datoteka, ki ste jo poslali ni v veljavni obliki. Prosimo, naložite JPG, GIF ali PNG datoteko.

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 4MB. Please reduce file size before submitting again.
trans-unit.target: Limit velikosti datotek je 4MB. Prosimo, zmanjšajte velikost datoteke pred ponovnim nalaganjem.

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 2MB.Please reduce file size.
trans-unit.target: Limit velikosti datotek je 2MB. Prosimo, zmanjšajte velikost.

trans-unit.source: Caption must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Besedilo pod sliko mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The caption cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Besedilo pod sliko ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov.

trans-unit.source: The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters. Shorten your review.
trans-unit.target: Ocena ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov. Skrajšajte svojo oceno.

trans-unit.source: The review must contain at least %min_length% characters
The review contains characters that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Ocena vsebuje znake, ki niso dovoljeni

trans-unit.source: The review contains words that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Ocena vsebuje besede, ki niso dovoljene

trans-unit.source: The answer cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Odgovor ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The answer must contain at least %min_length% characters
The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Ocena ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: the answer contains words that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Odgovor vsebuje besede, ki niso dovoljene

trans-unit.source: The caption must contain at least 3 characters
trans-unit.target: Besedilo pod sliko mora vsebovati vsaj 3 znake

trans-unit.source: The caption cannot contain more than 255 characters
trans-unit.target: Besedilo pod sliko ne sme vsebovati več kot 255 znakov

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Select your town/city from the dropdown list.
trans-unit.target: To polje je obvezno. Izberite svoj kraj/mesto s seznama.

trans-unit.source: This field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: To polje ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: You must select Street and/or Nighbourhood
You must enter Street and/or Nighbourhood
You must enter Street Number and/or Entrance
trans-unit.target: Vpisati morate številko ulice in/ali vhoda

trans-unit.source: You need to register a business account in order to manage you company's listing in getlokal.ro
trans-unit.target: Če želite upravljati s svojim oglasom na getlokal.ro morate registrirati poslovni račun

trans-unit.source: Log out of your user profile and register as a business
trans-unit.target: Odjavite se iz svojega uporabniškega profila in se registrirajte kot podjetje

trans-unit.source: Only business users can claim companies!
trans-unit.target: Samo poslovni uporabniki lahko objavljajo podjetja!

trans-unit.source: Enter the URL of Your Blog
The field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: To polje ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The field must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: To polje mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: This field is not mandatory but if you fill it in it must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: To polje ni obvezno, če ga izpolnite pa mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: This field is not mandatory but if you fill it in itcannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: To polje ni obvezno, če ga izpolnite pa ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: There was a problem changing your password. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Pri spreminjanju vašega gesla je prišlo do napake. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno kasneje.
Vaše geslo je bilo uspešno spremenjeno

trans-unit.source: The start date cannot be earlier than today
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum ne sme biti pred današnjim

trans-unit.source: The start date of the second promo month cannot be earlier than the end date of the first
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum drugega promocijskega meseca ne sme biti pred končnim datumom prvega

trans-unit.source: The start date of the third promo month cannot be earlier than the end date of the second
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum tretjega promocijskega meseca ne sme biti pred končnim datumom drugega

trans-unit.source: The start date for the third period must not be later than 30 days before the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum tretjega obdobja ne sme kasneje kot 30 dni pred končnim datumom vašega oglasa

trans-unit.source: The start date for the period must not be later than 30 days before the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum obdobja ne sme kasneje kot 30 dni pred končnim datumom vašega oglasa

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title cannot be longer than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov ponudbe ne sme biti daljši kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of vouchers issued per user cannot exceed the total number of vouchers for the offer
trans-unit.target: Maksimalno število kuponov, izdanih na uporabnika ne sme presegati celotnega števila kuponov za to ponudbo

trans-unit.source: You cannot select a date earlier than today's
trans-unit.target: Ne morete izbrati datuma pred današnjim

trans-unit.source: Тhe end date of your offer cannot be later than the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Končni datum vaše ponudbe ne sme biti kasneje od končnega datuma vašega oglasa

trans-unit.source: The offer end date cannot be earlier than the start date
trans-unit.target: Končni datum ponudbe ne more biti pred začetnim datumom

trans-unit.source: The voucher valid to date cannot be earlier than the offer end date
trans-unit.target: Datum veljavnosti kupona ne sme biti pred datumom izteka ponudbe

trans-unit.source: The email address is not in a valid format
trans-unit.target: E-poštni naslov ni v veljavni obliki

trans-unit.source: You need to agree to getlokal's Terms of Use to create a user account
trans-unit.target: Če želite ustvariti uporabniški račun morate najprej sprejeti getlokal Pogoje uporabe

trans-unit.source: Location is mandatory. Start typing the name of your location and select from the list.
trans-unit.target: Lokacija je obvezna. Začnite pisati ime svoje lokacije in izberite s seznama.

trans-unit.source: Password must be at least %min_length% characters
Password cannot be more than %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Geslo ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: Description must contain at least %min_length% characters
The description cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Opis ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov.

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov ponudbe mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title and Terms are mandatory for at least one of the two language versions.
trans-unit.target: Naslov ponudbe in pogoji so obvezni za vsaj eno izmed dveh jezikovnih verzij.

trans-unit.source: The Newsletter Title cannot be longer than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov glasila ne sme biti daljši od %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The Newsletter Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov glasila mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: Message must contain at least %min_length% characters
The message cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Sporočilo ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov.

trans-unit.source: This email and unsubscribed key do not match
trans-unit.target: Ta e-pošta in odjavna koda se ne ujemata

trans-unit.source: Video Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov videoposnetka mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The video title cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Naslov videoposnetka ne sme vsebovati več kot %max_length% znakov

trans-unit.source: The email message was not sent successfully.
trans-unit.target: To e-poštno sporočilo ni bilo uspešno poslano.

trans-unit.source: This username has already been registered by another user
trans-unit.target: To uporabniško ime je že v uporabi

trans-unit.source: Тhe start date cannot be later than the end date of the event
trans-unit.target: Začetni datum ne sme biti kasneje kot končni datum dogodka

trans-unit.source: Please add location - city/town is required if venue not known!
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, dodajte lokacijo - v primeru, da ne poznate prizorišča je zahtevano mesto/kraj!

trans-unit.source: Please enter the characters from the picture below to confirm you like parties!
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, vpišite znake iz spodnje slike in potrdite, da imate radi zabave!

trans-unit.source: Fields marked with a star are mandatory.
trans-unit.target: Polja, označena z zvezdico so obvezna.

trans-unit.source: I declare that I am an authorized representative of the business.
trans-unit.target: Izjavljam, da sem pooblaščeni zastopnik tega podjetja.

trans-unit.source: Enter the CUI of your business.
Declare that you are an authorized representative of the business.
trans-unit.target: Izjavite, da ste pooblaščeni zastopnik tega podjetja.

trans-unit.source: You entered "%value%". The security check picture contains %length% characters. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Vnesli ste "%value%". Slika za varnostni pregled vsebuje %length% znakov. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.

trans-unit.source: Security check. Enter the characters from the picture below
trans-unit.target: Varnostni pregled. Vnesite znake iz spodnje slike

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of vouchers to be issued
Maximum number of vouchers to be issued per user
trans-unit.target: Maksimalno število kuponov za izdajo na uporabnika

trans-unit.source: Select a photo from your computer
Please enter your Name and Surname
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, vpišite svoje ime in priimek

trans-unit.source: Please agree to observe the Terms of Use of the Getlokal Website
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, potrdite, da ste prebrali Pogoje uporabe Getlokal spletne strani

trans-unit.source: Choose if you want to recommend this company to a friend
trans-unit.target: Izberite, če želite to podjetje priporočiti prijatelju

trans-unit.source: Your username should contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, dot or underscore and begin with a letter
trans-unit.target: Vaše uporabniško ime lahko vsebuje le črke in številke, pomišljaj, piko ali podčrtaj, začeti pa se mora s črko

trans-unit.source: Your account changes were successfully saved.
trans-unit.target: Spremembe vašega računa so bile uspešno shranjene.

trans-unit.source: The email and/or password are invalid
Username must contain at least %min_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime mora vsebovati vsaj %min_length% znakov.

trans-unit.source: The username and/or password you entered for %s are invalid or you don't have enough credentials
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime in/ali geslo, ki ste ju vnesli za %s sta neveljavna, ali pa nimate potrebnih dovoljenj

trans-unit.source: The username and/or password you entered are invalid or you don't have enough credentials
trans-unit.target: Uporabniško ime in/ali geslo, ki ste ju vnesli sta neveljavna, ali pa nimate potrebnih dovoljenj
